summary:
i just like to have a big fluffy tail for my character, so i made this mod

This mod adds a wearable werewolf Tail and Ears, they are craftable in any forge, and are not enchantable (to be balanced), these are fashion items for those people who wants to have a big fluffy tail for their character
descriptionHtml:
[center]Don't forget to add your own screenshots! :D[/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-1-1364358509.png[/img][/center]
[size=1][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]Ownership: Loshirai14[/b][/right][/font][/color][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]User ID: 4958627[/b][/right][/font][/color][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]Don't forget to VOTE and ENDORSE![/b][/right][/font][/color][/size]
[center][size=6][font=papyrus]Requires Skyrim 1.6.89 or higher[/font][/size][/center]
[center][font=papyrus][size=4]Check out my other mods [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/179291]HERE[/url][/size][/font][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27997-1-1355009912.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-2-1353144913.png[/img]
First of all, if you want your color to be like those on the images, download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/586]White Werewolf[/url]

i just like to have a big fluffy tail for my character, so i made this mod

This mod adds a wearable werewolf Tail and Ears, they are craftable in any forge, and are not enchantable (to be balanced), these are fashion items for those people who wants to have a big fluffy tail for their character

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-1-1355014180.png[/img]

Crafting Recipe:
- 1 Leather
- 2 Leather Strips

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-3-1355014181.png[/img]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-2-1355014181.png[/img]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-4-1353144913.png[/img]
- download the latest version
- extract files with winRAR
- copy file and paste it in your data folder
- overwrite if asked
- start the game and enjoy
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-5-1353144913.png[/img]
Please ask for my permission if you are going to edit, translate or re-upload this mod to other community sites!!
author: Loshirai14
